narrative.narrative: Air Cairo is a 60% owned subsidiary of EgyptAir. It is based at its namesake city of Cairo and is also owned 20% by the National Bank of Egypt and 20% by Bank Misr. Its roots start in 1997 when it was an independant company that flew Tupolev's, in 2003 EgyotAir bought 40% and later 60% of the company and it was turned into a charter airline. In 2012 it started scheduled flights from Alexandria to Kuwait,Amman,Jeddah,Tripoli,Sabha and Misrata. And from Hurghada to Belgrade. As of 2014 they had five A320's with three on order.
